General.Name: Guangdong Shunkong Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Shunkong Development Co.,Ltd. engages in the production and sale of tap water in China. It offers solid waste treatment, municipal engineering, and environmental testing and protection consulting, and ecological and environmental services. The company also provides garbage disposal and sludge treatment services. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Foshan, China. Guangdong Shunkong Development Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Guangdong Shunde Holding Group Company.
